targets.expr: 100 * (sum(increase(unleasherator_federation_published_total{k8s_cluster_name="management", status="success"}[24h])) or vector(0)) / ((sum(increase(unleasherator_federation_published_total{k8s_cluster_name="management", status="success"}[24h])) or vector(0)) + (sum(increase(unleasherator_federation_published_total{k8s_cluster_name="management", status="failed"}[24h])) or vector(0)) + 0.0001)

count by (k8s_cluster_name) (unleasherator_remoteunleash_status{k8s_cluster_name!="management", status="Connected"} == 1) / count by (k8s_cluster_name) (unleasherator_remoteunleash_status{k8s_cluster_name!="management", status="Reconciled"} == 1)
